sysspec.belarc_desc: For comprehensive system information, we recommend using Belarc Advisor (free tool) to generate a detailed system report. This ensures accurate hardware specifications for scientific reproducibility.
sysspec.belarc_step2: Run the tool to generate your system report
sysspec.belarc_step3: Save the report as an HTML file (File ‚Üí Save As)
sysspec.belarc_step4: Click "Import Belarc Report" below to auto-fill fields
sysspec.ph_model: e.g., MSI GE72 6QF Rev 1.0 Gaming Laptop
sysspec.ph_boot: e.g., UEFI with Secure Boot enabled
sysspec.ph_igpu: e.g., Intel HD Graphics 530 (shares system memory)
sysspec.ph_driver: e.g., NVIDIA Driver 472.12, Intel Graphics Driver 27.20.100.9466
sysspec.ph_sys_drive: e.g., 128GB Toshiba THNSNJ128G8NY SSD (Boot drive C:)
sysspec.ph_add_drives: e.g., 1TB HGST HTS721010A9E630 HDD (Storage drives D:, F:)
sysspec.ph_perf_notes: e.g., SSD system drive ensures consistent load times
sysspec.ph_net_conn: e.g., Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC 3165 @ 72 Mbps
sysspec.confirm_clear: Clear all system information fields? This will reset to default values.
sysspec.save_success: System information saved successfully! This will be included in your test result exports.
sysspec.save_error: Failed to save system information. Please try again.
sysspec.import_invalid: Please select an HTML file exported from Belarc Advisor.
sysspec.import_success: Belarc report imported successfully! Review the fields and click Save.
